content:
@Chris Moesel I'm trying to debug an issue with Saner for @Keith Boone but I can't get past this line:

Sushi: info Converting FSH to FHIR resources... (00:02.0036)

It just hangs here....

@Chris Moesel is taking some time off this week, but the rest of us on the SUSHI team can look at this. Does this happen using the master branch on this IG: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-saner? I tried to recreate using that, and it didn't hang. The Converting FSH to FHIR resources... step is where the bulk of the work happens with SUSHI, so it's not easy to pinpoint.

SUSHI has a --debug flag, but we haven't yet had a need for a lot of debug messages, so the flag may not help much, but it could be worth a shot. Does that hang also happen when running SUSHI outside of the context of the IG Publisher? So sushi fsh/ from the root of the Saner IG folder?
it's stopped happening. I'll investigate when/if it happens again
